snippet: Residents were angry about the severity of fine-particle pollution in the capital and the government’s lack of transparency.
abstract: China says that it will begin publishing more detailed air quality data on Beijing, following a public outcry over official government readings that critics say underestimated the severity of the air pollution problem in the smog-filled capital.
lead_paragraph: Residents were angry about the severity of fine-particle pollution in the capital and the government’s lack of transparency.

headline.seo: China to Release More Data on Air Pollution in Beijing
headline.main: China to Release More Data on Air Pollution in Beijing
headline.print_headline: China to Release More Data On Air Pollution in Beijing
